mapper.select: select a.app_id as appId, SUM(CASE WHEN statis_type = '1' THEN a.user_count ELSE 0 END) as startActiveCount, SUM(CASE WHEN statis_type = '9' THEN a.user_count ELSE 0 END) as startRequestCount FROM ( select app_id,statis_type,count(DISTINCT(imei)) as user_count from dp_app_start_user_data where create_time >= #{beginTime} and create_time <= #{endTime} and app_id = #{appId} and sdk_plugin_version > '2.1.9' and statis_type in('1','9') group by app_id,statis_type ) a group by app_id
